column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Liked this place way better than Giordano's.  One thing Giordano's had going for it was that you can order your pizza as soon as you check in
column2: so even if you wait 45 minutes
column3: your pizza is starting to get fired up so when you sit down
column4: you don't have to wait as long.  Giordano's has more of a "stuffed" feel to it and way cheesier
column5: but the flavor for Lou Malnati's was better for me.
